verses.roman:
ṛṣes tu vedaśirasas
tuṣitā nāma patny abhūt
tasyāṁ jajñe tato devo
vibhur ity abhiviśrutaḥ

synonyms: ṛṣeḥ—of the saintly person; tu—indeed; vedaśirasaḥ—Vedaśirā; tuṣitā—Tuṣitā; nāma—named; patnī—the wife; abhūt—begat; tasyām—in her (womb); jajñe—took birth; tataḥ—thereafter; devaḥ—the Lord; vibhuḥ—Vibhu; iti—thus; abhiviśrutaḥ—celebrated as.
translation: Vedaśirā was a very celebrated ṛṣi. From the womb of his wife, whose name was Tuṣitā, came the avatāra named Vibhu.
